item.title: Tribute to PureVolume
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Tribute to PureVolume Check out the GitHub repository and the website. PureVolume was a website for the discovery and promotion of new music and emerging artists. The mission was to give artists a new promotion tool. The site shut down on June 30, 2018. Luckily it was archived by Wayback Machine. This is a profile page of a band. For the music player is used this one by Zakari Abdessamad.

item.title: This site!
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Personal site A blog-like site to upload projects and stuff I’ve been working on. Made with Hugo Framework, using Loveit theme and some personal tweaks and changes.

item.title: Inventory Management Website
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Inventory and product management website. Check out the GitHub repository and the website. This project was developed for the “Codo a Codo - Django” course together with Omar Scarazzato. It was made with Django Framework and PostgreSQL. The website allows the stock management of a warehouse. There are 3 levels of users: Employee (Level 1, mostly read permissions). Supervisor (Level 2, read and write permissions). Administrator (Level 3, read and write permissions and access to Django’s admin panel).

item.title: Age Of Carpincho Website.
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Age of Carpincho. Check out the GitHub repository and the website. A site made with Angular framework that shows Plotly graphs of Age Of Empires II data. The project was originally just a static web page which can be viewed here and this is the GitHub repository for that site. After learning a bit of Angular in a course I decided to take the site to the next level.

item.title: Binance P2P Python Script.
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Python script to find arbitrage opportunities in Binance using P2P and Spot Market. Check out the GitHub repository. One of my first Python scripts. It uses the Binance API to retrieve price information for BTC, ETH and USDT in both Spot and P2P markets. Output:

item.title: Age of Empires II: R Script: Most used civilizations.
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: AoE 2 - Most Used Civilization. Check out the GitHub repository. R script to get the last 10 matches (using aoe2.net API) and output a Plotly pie chart of the civs used.

item.title: Age of Empires II: R Script: Compare players' ratings.
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: AoE 2 - Compare User ELO Ratings. Check out the GitHub repository. R script that outputs a Plotly graph comparing player’s elo rating across time, using aoe2.net API. INPUT: OUTPUT:
